akn:subsection.akn:heading: Effect on certain existing shares and programs

akn:content.akn:p: (h) Effect on certain existing shares and programs Nothing in this chapter, or the amendments made by the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Reauthorization Act of 2006, shall be construed to require a reallocation or a reevaluation of individual quota shares, processor quota shares, cooperative programs, or other quota programs, including sector allocation in effect before January 12, 2007.
